installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Fix broken Debian Buster sources
sed -i 's|http://deb.debian.org/debian|http://archive.debian.org/debian|g' /etc/apt/sources.list
sed -i 's|http://security.debian.org|http://archive.debian.org/debian-security|g' /etc/apt/sources.list
echo 'Acquire::Check-Valid-Until "false";' > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/99no-check-valid-until

# Install deps
apt-get update -y
apt-get install -y curl python3 python3-pip openjdk-11-jdk-headless rsync

# Install Python deps
pip3 install tqdm requests wget

# Setup server dir
cd /mnt/server
curl -o C-S-D.tar.gz -L "https://github.com/SecretSphinx/Minecraft-Serverpack-Installer/archive/master.tar.gz"
tar -zxvf C-S-D.tar.gz --strip-components=1

# Clean old files if they exist
rm -rf libraries mods coremods .fabric user_jvm_args.txt server.jar

# Run the Python installer
python3 run.py -provider curse -modpack-id ${MODPACK_ID} --modpack-version ${VERSION_ID} --clean-scripts --pterodactyl

# Cleanup
rm C-S-D.tar.gz
rsync -a modpack_folder/ .
rm -rf modpack_folder
rm *.py README.md requirements.txt
rm -r __pycache__

# Forge symlink
ln -sf libraries/net/minecraftforge/forge/*/unix_args.txt unix_args.txt
